name: Natalie Du Pasquier
biography:
Since 1979, has lived and work in Milan. Founding member of  Memphis. Designed fabrics, rugs, objects and furniture for Memphis and other companies. Since 1987, has concentrated on painting, and has worked in ceramics as well.
Exhibitions: Annual since 1989, Le Cadre Gallery, Hong Kong; Galleria Jannone, Milan, 1987, 1994; FruitMarket Gallery, Edinburgh, 1993; Galleria Corraini, Mantua, 1996; Fenderesky Gallery, Belfast, 1997; Galleria Colombo of Contemporary Art, Milan, 1996, 1998.
Source: www.futurarium.com, 2001.
